content.detailedDescription: I was going through my iphone pictures yesterday and found a odd orb in the photo i took of a full moon.It looks like it is going behind the moon at some incredible speed since it looks like it went from on side of the moon to the other in under a minute. the files out stamped with a creation date of 11-16-2013 8:26 pm for all five pics. i didn't even know this was there until yesterday. i just thought the full moon looked pretty good and wanted to see if the iphone could take a decent pic of it, which looks kinda of blah. so i was kinda of surprised to see this when i was looking thru it. i have circled the object in the picture. it is in 3 of the 5 i will send you and i have named them 1-5 in the order they were on my phone. thought it was kinda of neat, maybe satellite, planet or space station.....Or alien.
content.summary: Ufo in iphone picture of moon

content.detailedDescription: I'm standing outside looking at the sky as i normally do on your night and this thing flew over my head probably in the heights of quarter to a half a mile make no sound had a very very faint glow 3 round lights somehow connected together moving and move in together as a unit i only got a second and a half to a twosecond view of it and then it was gone it move so quickly and had such a massive size i cant imagine that a human could could could produce this thingi was not alone there was there's one another witness to this event.I've always been interested in ufo's and ufo activity but after this i am now a true believer in the existence of flying craft that are not of this planeti can't definitively say what i saw but i can say for sure that i don't know of any capabilities that we have as a human race to produce something that could move at this speed and bethis size without making some kind of a of a noisei was shocked to say the least and even though i've slept on it and this is the following day that i'm writing this i'm still somewhat speechless.Being somewhat of an enthusiast i immediately wrote down all the information that i could put together about the event and it everything is it that i have is pretty accurateit ended when the craft disappeared behind the trees and i could no longer see it but it happened very very rapidly
content.summary: Passed overhead very! rapidly no sound faint glo huge in size

content.detailedDescription: I'm standing outside looking at the sky as i normally do on your night and this thing flew over my head probably in the heights of quarter to a half a mile make no sound had a very very faint glow 3 round lights somehow connected together moving and move in together as a unit i only got a second and a half to a twosecond view of it and then it was gone it move so quickly and had such a massive size i cant imagine that a human could could could produce this thingi was not alone there was there's one another witness to this event.I've always been interested in ufo's and ufo activity but after this i am now a true believer in the existence of flying craft that are not of this planeti can't definitively say what i saw but i can say for sure that i don't know of any capabilities that we have as a human race to produce something that could move at this speed and bethis size without making some kind of a of a noisei was shocked to say the least and even though i've slept on it and this is the following day that i'm writing this i'm still somewhat speechless.Being somewhat of an enthusiast i immediately wrote down all the information that i could put together about the event and it everything is it that i have is pretty accurateit ended when the craft disappeared behind the trees and i could no longer see it but it happened very very rapidly
content.summary: Passed overhead very! rapidly no sound faint glo huge in size

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into my drive way, i had never seen anything like it before and have been around aircraft all my life.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star but then i quckly noticed it was moving very fast moving from northeast toward the west it then stoped dead and hovered for about 5 min. it was kind of domed shaped on top but flat on the bottom there was no soun and the color it seemed to be glowing it was bluish green very bright in color. after the sighting sighting i almost couldnt believe what i had seen, told my family what i had seen right after the sighting i was vey excited. it went back toward the north east very fast it was out of my sight within a half of a second if i would have blinked i would have missed its leaving
content.summary: I watched a bright grenish blue object flying fron the northeast moving west i then witnessed it hovering maybe a mile and a half from me after watching it for about 5 min it left the area backnortheast if i would have blinked i would have missed it.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were driving home from college in her convertible late at night.  one of us looked up and saw these distinct red lights.  i think they were in the process of forming a circle maybe 15 degrees in diameter directly overhead.  they stayed in that circle for maybe a minute, but i can't remember for sure how they disappeared.  it seems that they were just suddenly gone.  we both saw them clearly.

both of us were sceptical about ufo's, so i think we assumed there was an explanation.  it is the only time in my life that i saw something that was (i now know) unexplainable.
content.summary: Red lights formed a circle directly overhead then vanished.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: My wife and i walked outside at about 10:00 pm to have a cigarette. there was a bright star in the sky and my wife jokingly said "hey, theres uranus." we then noticed that the star seemed to be moving slightly. it looked like it was jumping around. as we were looking in the sky we saw a flash off in the distance to our right. we noticed an object, that at first glance appeared to be an airplane. as we watched it we noticed that its movements were nothing like an airplane. it appeared weightless and had red and white blinking lights that flashed randomly. we stood in amazement trying to make sense of what it was. the more we watched the object the more we realized this was definitely not a plane. then we noticed small lights that really seemed to be stars until you looked very closely at them. there was a group of four that made a constellation like a rhombus. each one them very vaguely blinked between red, red-orange, white, and moved around randomly. you had to watch these with a close eye or you might never notice anything weird. they also seemed to be letting out little strakes from them and what looked like smaller orbs flying around them, almost like when someone shows you a diagram of an atom. we saw another object that looked like a plane at first. then we saw another. as we looked around the sky there must have been 6 or 7 in the air at one time. all at various altitudes. a couple of them would be still and just hover while others would move across the sky. there was one that flew lower than the rest of them and i really thought it might have been a plane just by the way the lights were blinking. but it was big and oddly enough i could not make out a distinct shape of any of these objects. as we were looking in amazement my wife and i then saw a huge white flare shoot across the sky. it looked like it could have been a firework. it was much too ow to be shooting star. i could see a very opaque white light surrounded by a more transparent glow around it. it had a tail as it streaked across the sky and it looked like energy or liquid light was flying off of it. we got a little freaked out at this point because it seemed to be so close. all the activity with the "plane" type lights still continued. it seemed like they were just going back and forth through the sky in no real hurry or effort. sometimes the lights on them would be red and sometimes they would be white. sometimes the craft would be lit up brighter than any star in the sky and some of them would not. the blinking always seemed random and sometimes absolutely frantic. this went on for about two hours and activity seemed to slow down. the crafts seemed to dwindle in numbers and sighting them became less often. the four star-like objects i mentioned earlier had dispersed and separated and were now further apart. this is when i started looking closer at all the stars and it seemed like there were about 10-12 stars in the sky that appeared to be stars but definitely were not. i am sure of this i watched them move around. there movement was subtle. it seemed like they were jumping around like the way a kid would point a laser pointer on the wall. they would, i don't know, "phase-out" then reappear in a different place but in the same general area. anybody that glanced in the sky would have seen stars. you had to really watch these to catch there movements. i even stared at actual stars just to make sure my eyes were not playing tricks on me and sure enough they were not. i had called my mom around 12:15am or so to see if she could see anything were she was at. at first she didnt believe me and as she looked she saw the activity as well. i watched the star-like objects until close to 1:00am until i was just too tired to watch anymore. i came inside and got ready to for bed and before i went to lay down i checked outside. this was maybe 20-25 minutes later and all those moving stars were gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple crafts with flashing and blinking lights sometimes very sporadic traveling in paths back and forth.

content.detailedDescription: I got up at 4 am to go the bathroom in our beach house in belize and noticed a bright light hovering over the sea. i know this was no star that i have ever seen before. so i woke my wife up and told her to grab her camera (this is the second one we have seen and we did not get a picture of the first one) so we went out to the beach an it was moving very fast in a small area, she took three photos of it. one photo from where we were standing then zoomed in on the other two. it only seemed like it was a few hundred yards above the sea. after getting the photos and watching it for a few minutes we went back to bed and never did see it leave.
content.summary: Ball of a white light, moving rapidly in one spot

content.detailedDescription:
Was taking a few nightsky shots with 35mm lens looking to capture stars,satellites, planes whatever.   walked over to the wife talking a minute when i noticed a brighter than usual light moving to the ene from the w. this would put this object crossing the beach just south of masonboro inlet.

the object was brighter than anything in the sky,silent,and stayed lit(not strobing).  only thing that flys this path is the sable chopper, and you can surely tell when he is flying by sound alone.   

  the 1st photo had to move the camera to position and was shaky.  in the 2nd photo(moved camera again to locate) the object was going behind the tree and in pic #3(had to move camera again) it is not shaky and shows the wobbly path and inconsistent yellow /orange glare.    i wished i had not been  set for 8 sec exposures as it appears to just be a trail of light. it is plain to see it is not a chopper or plane due to their lights are more consistent as evident in photo #3 of a planes lights.  

it did not appear to be moving extremely fast,but steady for sure.  in pic #3 i am not sure how to analyze the length of line the plane made in 6 secs at a further distance / as the object made at what appeared to me to be a closer distance.  the objects line seems to be 1.5 as fast as the plane.  silently is what gets me  : )
 
nikon d5200     35mm lens     f/1.8   iso-1600    8 sec
content.summary: Noticed silent yellow/orange orb approaching from w, had cam on tripod  8 sec exposures

content.detailedDescription: Two witnesses. we saw it hovering over the middle of guelph. we followed it until it was nearly above us. it then rapidly took off, headed for kitchener. we followed part way. we saw it circle again and head back towards guelph before heading due north. it pulsated white, blue, red, and green lights. it made no apparent noise. we witnessed other airplanes in the area. they were much higher than this object and did not pulsate; their lights flashed. we watched it for over 15 minutes before deciding to head home. the whole time we tracked it in our vehicles.
content.summary: Hovered over two cities, moved  in a near circe

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend was driving west to bowling when we both observed a bright light. it was like no light we had ever seen before it seemed to be pulsing like back and forth like the clouds were coming in front of it; only there were no clouds that low that night. so there should not have been anything to obstruct the view of the light. it seemed to get brighter and break up like it was maybe going to come towards us in three. again we commented it was unnerving because there was no light like that we had ever seen before. it seemed to go back together into one then go away slightly then like if you were driving and the moon was going "away" then it just seemed to be gone. we just couldn't believe something like that happened but the light was so unusual and the movement was not like anything i had seen before. not a star or a plane. unexplained for sure- i'm just glad i wasn't alone!!!
content.summary: I felt that a light appeared directly west in front of the direction that we were heading  stayed there  for at least the length of the turn onto route 31 until route 260. there was heavy traffic so there may have been other witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: We took a ride looking  for deer in the early evening, no deer but looking at my wife i noticed the red lite moving across the nite sky! i stopped the truck,got out and walked to the front of the truck. the red lite stopped for a few seconds then it turned itself into 3 liters the same size, a few moments later the triangular shape of lites began to head off in different directions at incredible speeds,(absolutely no way a human withstand the positive gs.) i am now since that sighting a true believer it has affected my life. we are being visited i am positive,just hope they are friendly.
content.summary: Red light traveling south,stops and hovers,turns into 3 liters for a short time,then1 lite at a time takes off at incredible speeds in different directions, my wife also witnessed this event

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on back patio stargazing while we let our dog out. there appeared 2 dim lights flying or moving in tandem with one slightly trailing the other. one of the 2 objects would glow very bright while the other would stay dim. as we watched them cross the sky they both would intermittently disappear and reappear. there was no cloud cover to hide them. there was a plane a few moments later that we compared them to and the plane's lights didn't change like the object did. we tried to locate them but they simply disappeared. my husband kept dying he didn't want to believe it was a ufo but willingly admitted it was because whatever we saw scared him. we were both very sober at the time.
content.summary: 2 dim lights moving in tandem, the lights would get very bright and then dim. moving north, no pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was walking home from a walk.

2. from the corner of my eye i saw a red light.

3. i thought it was a plane.

4.The object was just a consistent red light, it swayed through the sky and went in and out as if it were going in and out of clouds, but there were no clouds. the way it moved at that speed was almost impossible. it acted and appeared almost as a firefly, but red, big, high, and fast. 

5. after seeing it, i knew it wasn't typical aircraft. it was unusual, and that interested me enough to report it and tell others. 

6. i lost sight of the object after seeing it traveling fast and far enough to be out of sight within seconds.
content.summary: Bright red light swaying through the sky, about plane hight, was moving fast, and was going in and out. acted like a firefly, but was too high, red, and too fast.

content.detailedDescription: I just pulled into my parking space with my girlfriend and heard a helicopter coming over the front of my condo..I then got out of my ca r and looked up expecting to see a helicopter and saw a amberish orb going straight over my head and the over the tree line out of sight ...As soon as i saw it realizing it wasn't a helicopter i said out loud what the hell is that..As soon as isaid that my neighbor also said yeah what the hell is that...I didn't even know she was out side...Right after that a big black milatary looking hrlicopter csme over head in the ecact flight path trying to catch up...Snd about ten seconds after thst a small helicopter cam by in the same flight path with a spot light out in front of it...All parties that witnessed we in dhock and awe not kniwing what we just saw
content.summary: Saw an orb followed by to helicopters on close pursuit

content.detailedDescription: I got done work and it was raining till i got a few miles away from job site pulled in a gas station for smokes and saw the rainbow rolled my window down and took picture went in to store told some guy about rainbow and he went out and took a picture on my way back to truck i took one more picture well later that  night i sent them to my buddy i was looking and noticed 2 rainbows and then i looked at the 1st picture and between the rainbows is a rocket shaped thing with flames coming out back so i thought i would like you to look
content.summary: On my way home from work saw the rainbow and wanted picture put window down andsshaped it went in store took another one got home later and looked could not believe what i see

content.detailedDescription:
I was asleep. i woke up with a need to go outside. i went out, there was a light shining on a rock.  i touched the rock and was given a vision.  i've never had visions, i'm not mentally ill and not even interested in this and certainly won't talk about it.  i've been married to a narcotics detective twenty years with two teenage boys.  i'm not a sceptic or a believer to this point.  when i touched this rock within  30 seconds i was given thousands of years of history of how "aliens" were here many thousand years ago and what they are doing.  i was given information that a planet knew many thousand years ago their planets sun would die.  they wanted to make a new home.  they found our planet they found out conditions were comparable to them.  they have decided they didn't want to do the necessary things that need done to make the planet functional for them.  they showed pictures of different species to develop the planet they experimented with.  they showed me the help they have given along the way.  they need certain things mined built and ready for them.  they have given certain scientists and others knowledge the way it was given to me.  they gave us religion so we work together because ants work well together, bees work well together but they had to make us more advanced to get us to work together, religion.  they have given us the ability to understand how to process dna but only the knowledge to use it minimally.  they gave us fear of criminals and criminal elements so eventually the world will have every humans dna filed from birth.  they are able to read which of the humans by that they will keep when they come.  i'm not religious per say but the rapture as we understand it is somewhat true but based on our genes.  almost like whatever people they need to further them will be used.  they have astronauts kind of like we do that intervene if necessary, but it would have taken them too many resources to prepare our planet, that's why we are here and they give us motivations to go in the direction they want.  they need mercury gold other metals.  they need computers much more sophisticated than what we have, we are laying their groundwork.  they will live in harmony with us to the best of their ability when they come,but not everyone will benefit the society.  that's why we have been given dna knowledge.  i can't write everything i was shown it would take forever.  but the information was given to me in thirty seconds.  i don't know why me, i'm nobody just a mother disabled with lupus.  i spent 8 years in army reserves as supply specialist ages ago.  there is absolutely nothing extraordinary about me.  the light was a v shape the size of a small plane.  the beam that came down was like a laser beam and i could do nothing but walk to where it shone and touch it.  it didn't hurt it felt like nothing, but in the 30 seconds i was there i was given 3 lifetimes of information.  it was specific it was visual and i retained it.  i don't want to ever tell anyone this because they will think i'm nuts.  i would think they were nuts.  but i thought someone should have this knowledge,nd your the only people on the yahoo i could see to tell.  it's not like i can call the president and tell him.
anyway i wish there was a way i could give you all the things i learned, but i'm a busy mom and don't want to be responsible for this information, i really just want to forget it but my brain keeps putting it back no matter what else i try to think about.  so i'm hoping i told you it will be over.  a lot of the information i was given i don't even understand. but cave people were not the first people.  we have been started over on more than one occasion.  they have to be careful we have enough information to advance the planet where they want it but not too much where we blow our planet up and ruin it.  they are walking a tightrope of sorts and not even as 'll them always agree and we are a work in progress.
thank you for taking this information, hopefully it's not mine anymore.
denise
content.summary: A laser of light i had to approach, then was given an extraordinary amount of ibformation in very short time

content.detailedDescription: Late saturday night (before midnight) i was watching the last bit of fireworks out my window and noticed a moving set of lights far above the fireworks and began filming.  the video shows what i saw - the last of the first object passing slowly overhead, much larger than a plane only two lights were showing at this point, both on the same object.  it becomes obscured by a tree and comes in sights again for a few seconds before moving out of sight behind my house.  i look back to the point in the horizon where the first object appeared from and the second object appears, definite triangle shape made of three lights, same speed and direction on the same path, blinking lights, the object appears to be wobbling or spinning, changes the direction it faces but not the direction it moves. the second object goes behind the tree, comes into sights again for a few seconds before going behind the house out of sight.  i look towards the horizon spot again and a few more objects follow the same path and speed, the video is the whole ten minute sighting minus the few seconds prior to turning on and focusing the camera.  i filmed it because i have a moderate interest in the unknown and the objects were worth documenting as i haven't seen this particular triangle formation before.  no change in feelings.  i can share the video but i don't want to give exclusivity to any one site at this point.
content.summary: Multiple object flyover, following same path, first two objects triangular with three lights

content.detailedDescription:
At my front porch only my neighbor and i ,we were talking and suddenly she said look at the 4 bright lights they appear out of no where.  we were most intrigue looking at them it was interesting to see how bright they were and how they were changing positions they hovered for about 7 minutes looking brighter and brighter until one light totally fuse in to another one and they became only 3 lights instead. then i told my neighbor that i was going to get my cellphone next to my front door and when i turned around they just disappear in the thin air. normally we see lots of plains specially at night time we are in fly path from oia .Our apartment complex see and hear lots of plains day and night some fly by very close because they are big plains , i guess they come lower in order to land at the airport . but this was very different, i accepted from the moment we notice them that it was a ufo sighting because i seeing before a few months ago the lights in oviedo as i was driving near the oviedo mall in the evening. if there ever any doubt that we are not along in this universe to me question have being answer and this time with an extra witness. i am glad to know that people are more willingly to accept this phenomenon .Personally i had an experience in new rochelle ny in 1994, when i ask my mother and my son the next day, if they heard and felt what felt they laugh , it make feel like i was a loony tune. really never told any body much about it because people look at you like a weirdo. thank you for this opportunity


sincerely 
jacqueline lozada
content.summary: Ne location @9:15pm 4orange bright lights hovered slow movement one absorbed another they became 3 and  vanish in the dark very fast

content.detailedDescription:
This is and old story and doesn't have relevance now but i thought you would be interested.

when i was in high school in sacramento, ca, i used to climb on the roof of my house everynight for a period of about a month and watch the sky.  i was interested in ufos and had the idea that i could signal them. i had a strong lantern flashlight and i would shine it upward in the sky. i would sweep the sky and flash the light on and off for a period of two to four hours. 

one night i just noticed a white light in the sky. at first i thought it was an airplane but i didn't hear any noise. it slowly moved in my direction in a fluttery motion, in a a wavy path. the light got increasing brighter as it got closer. it stopped directly over me and was stationary for a few seconds or so then took off straight up like a light turning off. i thought i heard a click sound when it did that. i guess it leveled off because i saw it as a pinpoint of light (like a star) for a few seconds moving around before it disappeared. i can't estimate the size but from my vantage point, it was the size of a penny held at arms length. it was circular with fuzzy edges. 

i was grounded for a month so watching the sky at night was something to pass the time. from watching the sky everynight, i was able to tell which lights in the sky were satellites and which were aircraft. this was definitely neither. i had a camera but i was afraid if i took my eyes off the object to reach for the camera, that it would gone. my feelings during the experience were concerned and scared, then wonder. the experience was very surreal and it seemed like time slowed down. i lived at the time in neighborhood near the sacramento zoo. i never went up on the roof after this. i did not report this at the time.
content.summary: Saw a ufo move toward me and above me

content.detailedDescription: I have information i wish to pass on to you about a super secret army base that i believe is connected to usos and perhaps the "battle of los angeles" in 1942. i have been trying to contact you for some time without success. i am not seeking money or fame and it is very depressing i can't contact your organization. i am not a nut, a glory seeker, a liar or anything similar.
content.summary: Possible secret facility (ies)

content.detailedDescription: We (myself and two friends) had been moving gym equipment from a closed down gym to an unopened location about 30 miles away (going from an urban environment to a completely rural one).  we had finished the moving a little before 11 pm, but we were using the gym owner's car and trailer.  when we returned it, i discovered that i had lost my car keys sometime in the 5 or 6 hours that we had been moving stuff.  we asked the gym owner if we could take off the trailer, pay him for gas, and go to look for my keys.  he agreed and we drove all the way back to the rural area, stopping at any place that we had been while moving equipment.  after looking around and driving for a bit (using our phones as flashlights), we couldn't find anything so we started to drive back.  the gym owner said i could drive his car home since it was so late, but i had to drop off my two friends first. coming back out of the rural area, maybe 5 or 10 miles from the mall, one of my friends exclaimed "oh sh*t, i just saw a ufo!" we all kind of chuckled and he said "no, seriously" but my other friend and myself thought he was joking around.  we drove past the mall and then down past the grocery store to drop off my first friend (not the one who had claimed to see anything).  something was burning, probably some building somewhere, but it smelled like smoke.  it was also fairly foggy on top of it being a little smoky. we dropped off my first friend in his neighborhood and did a u-turn to go back up past the mall and get on the highway (to drop off the second friend and for me to go home).  after we passed the grocery store, it didn't smell like smoke anymore and there wasn't any fog. all of our car windows were down and it was a slightly chilly night (at least for florida).  there were absolutely no cars on the road except for us, and you could see headlights a couple miles ahead.  i was driving a bit slower (10 or 20 miles under the limit) when my second friend proclaimed again "there's a ufo!" i slowed down a bit and jolted my head over , and sure enough saw something black blur across the sky.  we both still kind of laughed it off because it could've been a big group of bats, or birds, or even a plane from a distance, but we still both watched the skies and i slowed down a bit more.  i had my head turned the same direction as he did and we both saw, right over (or maybe a little behind in the parking lot area) of best buy, two black oval shaped things rise up slowly and clearly.  it was perfectly clear and there wasn't any motion blur.  the sky was already really dark (at this point it was about 12:30), but it was darker than the sky.  you could see two of them and they didn't look connected but one was smaller than the other and they rose at the exactly same time and kept the distance between each other perfectly.  they (or it if it was just one with something attached) started slowly moving to the right of best buy (still over buildings) and keeping perfectly steady, not going up or down, and slightly picking up speed, and then picked up more speed before making a movement in the opposite direction.  we saw it move in the opposite direction (it went up, south slowly, and then north quickly, i know this because my town is on the water and it's pretty easy to tell where south is because of it).  we lost sight of it after it went north quickly because i was still driving the car, albeit slowly, and started to feel a little scared and picked up the pace.  as i sped up we saw what looked like a really strong strobe light at the ground behind it, and then we saw a red blinking light from some cell phone tower (or even an air traffic control tower).  we think the red blinking light is periodic, but the single strobe flash from the ground was weird.  it must have been really strong because it was incredibly bright from where we were.  it was probably behind the best buy or in the parking lot, but we still saw it over the roof and a couple hundred feet over on the road. while we watched it we were both filled with wonder and really interested.  i was still driving but there was no one else on the road and i couldn't stop looking at it.  we discussed checking behind the building but we both felt very eerie and decided to go home.  i dropped my second friend off and drove home, feeling pretty spooked, and nothing else happened past then.  we would have taken photos, but my phone was dead (charger was in my locked car that i had lost the key to), and the friend i was with didn't have his phone.  the two of us that did have our phones (one who wasn't in the car) both didn't have a charge because we had been using the flash as a flashlight to try to find my keys.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked like an organic black oval.  the only ones we saw clearly looked like two separate ones but they moved together perfectly.  one was smaller than the other and stationary to the bottom right of the bigger one.  no noise, smaller one was car sized.

content.detailedDescription:
At the age of 20 in 1994 i had never had an interest in ufos, outer space, science fiction, etc. i didn't even think the movie et was a big deal. i wanted nothing to do with it.  the year of 1994 by chance i met a new friend named "cassie" (not her true name) through a family member.  during conversations she brought up matter of factually that she was a "star-person".  i didn't know what that was so she explained that her being that sired her was not of this earth.  she stated that when she finally confronted her mother about it her mother put her head down on the kitchen table and cried saying she thought it had all been a dream.  naturally i thought at first i was dealing with a delusional person.  but she stayed consistent and never deterred from her nature or claims.  i started noticing her features.  she was small. her skin seemed almost transparent and delicate.  she had a big head and forehead yet tiny nose and tiny chin with thin and delicate lips.  i could see bigger eye sockets around her where her eyes were.  she told me many things i had never had even heard of or conceived of.  she told me of other beings called reptilians and that they were malevolent. she told me of something called greys and that they were benevolent but also in a type of study capacity. she told me of the men in black years before the movies came out.  she told me they were dangerous and that they were to be avoided at all times.  she would sing in a meditative like state and it was unlike anything i've heard.  it was like tinkling instruments and voice and rolled into one and i don't know what language she was singing.  but you wanted to stay in it. she liked to sleep in incubator type conditions.  she made tight sleeping quarters in the closet of her apartment. she eventually bought property in logan county and made a box like shelter from plywood that fit small single size raised pallet on one side which only left the other side with a shelf for supplies. i asked her many questions about the things she knew.  (she has vast unsurpassed knowledge that i wanted to but couldn't even fathom)  she told me that our human minds couldn't handle it.  it would be like crossing a threshold or going on the other side of a rainbow and our minds would go insane.  i also know that top government officials detained her at some point in her life wanting to know about the things she knew about and how.  she was my friend and i've never met anyone like her before or since.  

one afternoon my family member came by with my friend in attendance and asked me to go for a ride just to get out and get a break from the house and my young children.  it was a beautiful clear day.  blue skies and perfect temperatures.  we rode in a white chrysler le baron convertible with the top down north on i-35 from oklahoma city.  i was in the back seat, my family member was driving, and cassie was in the front passenger seat. we had planned to drive for awhile enjoying the day while stopping to eat and check out local shops.  while on the road cassie states that we had to keep driving since she was being "drawn" to a location but she didn't know where.  so we drove north on i-35 until she suddenly said to get off the highway.  we made many turns and asked many times where were we going.  she said she didn't know but would know when we got there.  we ended up on back roads, gravel and dirt.  she finally directed us to little more than a path not worthy to drive on as i remember it was very rough and actually caused some drag and grinding underneath the car.  we thought we were stuck a few times.  this path was in a massive open oklahoma field or farm.  it's the plains.  it was flat and mostly beige and brown topography with a little green.  there were some trees near by but we stopped at a rounded clearing.   cassie got out of the car and started walking towards the clearing.  i got out and stood by the car actually feeling stupid and bored.  i don't know where or how she got it but she handed me a big heavy looking jagged rock thing.  it was a silvery black color.  she told me it was like a magnet and under no circumstances to let go of it or get near the car with it.  i became slightly more alert and followed her instructions though i was perplexed.  my family member stayed by me.  cassie walked back out into the clearing and as she did suddenly out of nowhere this craft type object came  swishing by from my right to left several yards and then it was gone.  it was cigar or comet shaped.  it had a low hum sound barely audible.  at first i thought it glowed and then realized it was a reflection from some type of metallic material i've never seen before.  it was only about 40 ft above my head.  i was in shock.  cassie has just stayed in the clearing kneeling with her head down as this occurred.  i was speechless.   when she came back to the car she told me that she had been "directed" to go there because "they" wanted us to witness this event.  she told me that she had asked me to hold this huge magnet so that i would not be "taken up" with it.  

after i went home i couldn't speak or eat for a few days.  still in shock.  i've only tried to tell a few people through the years what i witnessed but am never able to articulate the enormity of it.  and i come across and a fruitcake.   cassie and i continued to stay in contact for about a year after that.  i just accepted who she claimed to be and who she was.   she was kind and gentle.  she was fragile and strong.  she had been hurt too.  deeply.   very wise and very special.   i think of her often still and wish we were still friends.   this incident has made me question everything i was taught to believe, to think, what i think i know and don't know.     i will never forget this for the rest of my life.
content.summary: Witnessed cigar shaped glowing/reflective object in the middle of the afternoon on a cloudless day in a remote oklahoma field.

content.detailedDescription:
I was living at my girlfriend's house and needed cigarettes so i headed to the convenience store that is situated roughly 300 meters east of her residence.

 as i was walking i suddenly noticed a light in the sky ahead of me as i looked up a saw a ring of light surround the object/light as it elevated rapidly into the upper atmosphere to disappear. i have never seen something move so fast let along while gaining incredible amounts of altitude. to recap: saw light from corner of my eye, looked at it then not even a second or two later it generated the ring and i saw the object shoot up towards space all in a matter of 10 seconds or less.

 i was in shock at first, being a very logical person (asperger's syndrome) i tried to find a rational explanation. thought it could be the second stage of a rocket by now man made rocket/missile can attain those speeds of climb. but when i finally arrived at the convenience store i was excited by what i had seen.
content.summary: Stationary object in sky suddenly dains altitude then disapears

content.detailedDescription:
Returning from checking a possible water well pump leak and looked
east towards the woods on my property.
hovering above the treeline was a series of 3 gold/copper-colored lights
which appeared to move very slowly toward, then away from observer
(several times).
when viewed through 7x35 binoculars, dimmer lights could be observed
(too numerous to count), which appeared to be "doughnut-shaped" and
behind the brighter lights in a vertical orientation (relative to
the brighter lights).
observer attempted to gain video and still photos of the lights.
observer contacted youngstown-warren regional airport tower and was informed
that there were no aircraft in the area.
object(s) continued to slowly move left/right, up/down, toward/away
from observer below scattered clouds for approximately 45 minutes,
then slowly ascended above cloud cover and was lost to sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering/slow course changes toward & away from observer

content.detailedDescription: Was laying in bed and glanced up at the window and saw a bright yellowish white light zoom very, very quickly across the sky at 12:39am pst. my fan was on high, so i did not notice any sounds.
content.summary: Was laying in bed and glanced up at the window and saw a bright yellowish white light zoom very, very quickly across the sky at 12:39am pst. my fan was on high, so i did not notice any sounds.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 8:20pm, i had just stepped outside to smoke a cigarette and as usual looked up at the night sky. it was a very clear night. no clouds, just the stars. just northwest was a big bright light in the sky, bigger than anything i had ever seen flying. i assumed it was a plane crashing and walked towards the street to get a better look. it was a bright white ball of light just hovering. after a moment, it dropped. it dropped straight down out of the sky past the tree tops. it was insanely fast. i listened for a sound. nothing. i went and turned the news on and nothing, no plane crash, no nothing. i panicked, i swear my heart stopped. it was so far away and in pretty much a desert so i didn't bother going to find out what it was. i was alone at the time, i wasn't brave enough to do it alone.
content.summary: Saw a huge white ball of light hovering in the air then it fell out of the sky straight down.

content.detailedDescription: As i walked outside to photograph mars to the west i noticed a bright orange orb not familiar in the flight path of o'hare airport. i grabbed my new nikon camera and tried to snap shots as fast as possible. within the span of 2 min. it was gone but manage to get a few images wight he telephoto lenz.
content.summary: Noticed it as a bright orange light like never before observed as i live by ohare airport. also as an aviator i have never seen a light light this in all my years.

content.detailedDescription: I was in an airplane that had just taken off from phx airport. i was looking out the window and noticed some lights to the south. they were over a cluster of hilly areas  or just in front of them. there were about 5, maybe more. they would disappear and reappear in a different spot. some didnt disappear at all. they just sat there. the configuration was random but it looked like some were higher in altitude than others. it lasted for a minute or more before they all disappeared and the plane was beyond visual range.
content.summary: Multiple orange/copper/natural lights appearing and disappearing over south side of pheonix

content.detailedDescription: No se ven a simple vista, solo aparecen en las fotos con las camaras, en esta zona hay crteres, lagunas y volcanes mis compaeros de trabajo y yo hemos tomado muchas fotos y ah aparecen, es como si fuera un ruta o algo asi
content.summary: Registred by the camera after of taken

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Walking dog in our neighborhood looked up and thought a plane or helicopter was coming towards us.  color was reddish-orange, round with spikes, or star shaped.  the orb moved from the se to the nw and passed directly overhead.  the object had no noise and moved steadily.
content.summary: Wife and i walking dog and noticed redish orange glowing object moving across sky
